## a.time() function

A time scalar type that is represented server-side as an extended ISO 8601 time string in the format `hh:mm:ss.sss`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function time(): ModelField<Nullable<string>, never, undefined, ModelFieldType.Time>;
```
